ygData.subject: Re: Ahhh
ygData.msgSnippet: Hmm, glad to see this list is getting active. As the moderator, I was getting a little worried. Well, some of the early inactivity is due to the fact that I
ygData.messageBody:
Hmm, glad to see this list is getting active. As the moderator, I was getting
a little worried. Well, some of the early inactivity is due to the fact that
I haven't been on AOL in over a month because I switched to another service.
Also, probably the bigger reason (this will really seem like backstabbing on
this list, but....) I've switched to Rallos Zek. I find it DOES offer a
better role playing enviroment and it really adds to the fun of the game when
a huge swarm of trolls/ogres/DEs attacks Freeport and whatnot. People can't
just go around being jerks, or people will kill them. Most people say, "Oh,
Zek, that's where everyone gets randomly PKed." Well, that's simply not true,
I live in Grobb and Nek Forest, and I hear about maybe one or two instances a
day, mostly RPing. In case you haven't picked up on it, I recommend this
server highly! I really can't even think about going back to the other
servers now, they just seem so dry. I don't really know what onelist will
think if the moderator deletes his E-Mail account, so I'd like to see about
passing that position to someone else who is still active on Cazic. So,
E-Mail me if you would like to take over that bare-bones position. There's
really very little to do.


-Adam

AKA Grolm, Ralel, and Railz
on
Zek (give me a tell!)
